biocontainers.name: json_collect_data_source
biocontainers.summary: This tool is able to receive multiple datasets (optionally with their metadata) in a single query. as an extension of the galaxy-json-data-source tool (https://github.com/mdshw5/galaxy-json-data-source), it allows to handle archives (gz, bz2, tar, and zip) organizing their content in a collection.
